Publication Title: Stroma-Mediated Breast Cancer Cell Proliferation Indirectly Drives Chemoresistance by Accelerating Tumor Recovery between Chemotherapy Cycles
Publication Authors: Daria Miroshnychenko, Tatiana Miti, Pragya Kumar, Anna Miller, Mark Laurie, Nathalia Giraldo, Marilyn M Bui, Philipp M Altrock, David Basanta, Andriy Marusyk
Publication Abstract: The ability of tumors to survive therapy reflects both cell-intrinsic and microenvironmental mechanisms. Across many cancers, including triple-negative breast cancer (TNBC), a high stroma/tumor ratio correlates with poor survival.
